attributes.action: Campaign for the removal of Mr Juncker
attributes.additional_details: While the UK remains a 100% paid up member of the EU, could the government help our friends in the Europe who we are leaving behind, to have a better future without the likes of Mr Juncker at the helm of the EU.
attributes.background: We are committed Europeans.  But we have little belief in the effectiveness of the EU.  Our suspicions have been confirmed by the approach by the EU leadership since Brexit.  Moreover Mr Juncker has shown himself disdainful of people who do not agree with him, to the extent of wishing to punish them
